attributes.action: Abolish free road tax and parking for disabled drivers in receipt of Motability
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disabled drivers who are in receipt of Motability (where they receive a substantially subsidised and sometimes free vehicle) also enjoy free road tax and free parking. I believe this should be a means-tested benefit and that free road tax and parking should only be given to those drivers whose financial circumstances merit it.
